item.title: Azure Storage Account
item.description: Evolution> Evolution # StorageV1: Original BlobStorage: Introduced for Blob-specific capabilities StorageV2: Added ZRS support Data Lake Gen2: Supports Hierarchical Namespace, POSIX ACL, HDFS protocol Limitations> Limitations # StorageV1: No Blob features, no ZRS support ZRS: Not in StorageV1.
